channel.title: NYS:LLY on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:LLY on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Novo Is to Lilly What LVMH Is to Hermes, Fund Manager Reckons
item.description: A widening gulf between the stock performances of Novo Nordisk A/S and its main competitor Eli Lilly & Co has drawn comparison with two of the world’s largest luxury-goods makers.
